text: The 1982 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was played in Tulsa, Oklahoma after the conclusion of the 1981–1982 regular season. The won their first MVC Tournament title to earn an automatic bid to the 1982 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Category:1981–82 Missouri Valley Conference men's basketball season Category:Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1982 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
